scripts.cpp: npm run cpp:compile && npm run cpp:install
scripts.slice: npm run slice:server&& npm run slice:client
scripts.dist:notest:
npm run clean && npm run slice && npm run validate && npm run sdk && npm run docs && npm run prettier && npm run dist:copy && echo 'Firebolt Core SDK /dist/ is ready.
'
scripts.dist:copy: npm run dist:copy:sdk && npm run dist:copy:docs
scripts.dist:copy:sdk: mkdirp ./dist && cp -R build/javascript/src dist/lib && cp ./dist/firebolt-open-rpc.json ../../../dist/firebolt-core-open-rpc.json && cp ./dist/firebolt-app-open-rpc.json ../../../dist/firebolt-core-app-open-rpc.json
scripts.dist: npm run dist:notest && npm run test
scripts.test:setup: rm -rf test/transpiled-suite && npx tsc --target es6 --moduleResolution node --outDir test/transpiled-suite
scripts.test: npm run test:setup && NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules npx --config=jest.config.json --detectOpenHandles jest
scripts.broilerplate: rm ./CONTRIBUTING.md && cp ../../../CONTRIBUTING.md ./CONTRIBUTING.md && rm ./LICENSE && cp ../../../LICENSE ./LICENSE && rm ./NOTICE && cp ../../../NOTICE ./NOTICE
scripts.prettier: prettier build/**/*.mjs --write --parser babel && prettier build/**/*.md --write --parser markdown
